name: MIS Spend Breakdown Report
description:
Displays all prisoner spend transactions by transaction type on a chosen date.
FIN0028 - v00.00.06

dataset.name: Spend Breakdown
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME ELSE TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME) - 1 / 86400 END AS BUSINESS_DATE_AND_TIME, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'DR' THEN (CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2102' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) ELSE 0 END) AS DEBIT_SPEND_TRANSACTION FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.CASELOADS AT_CASELOADS, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('pbenson') AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND (AT_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND ((AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DAY_DATE) BETWEEN (TO_DATE('17-03-2009 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')) AND (TO_DATE('25-03-2009 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')))) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME ELSE TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME) - 1 / 86400 END, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION HAVING SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'DR' THEN (CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2102' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) ELSE 0 END) > 0), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, BUSINESS_DATE_AND_TIME, TRANSACTION_TYPE, DESCRIPTION, DEBIT_SPEND_TRANSACTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Data Refreshed Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT TRUNC(BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_END_DATETIME) AS LOAD_END_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT LOAD_END_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

errors.error: Error: Error: Query failed: GENERIC_USER_ERROR: Failed To Get Query Passthrough Schema
